content.text: From July 14-15, 2025, the elizaOS/eliza repository showed significant activity with 5 new pull requests (all of which were merged), 1 new issue, and contributions from 7 active developers.
PR #5580 by @wtfsayo titled 'fix: address type safety and testing issues from PR #5505' is merged, addressing type safety concerns.
PR #5562 by @wtfsayo titled 'fix: graceful shutdown for dev server on Cmd+C (SIGINT/SIGTERM)' is merged, improving development experience.
PR #5568 by @wtfsayo titled 'fix(plugin-bootstrap): separate provider state from action callbacks to prevent ATTACHMENTS interference' addresses plugin bootstrap issues.
PR #5571 by @wtfsayo titled 'fix(cli): improve plugin dependency loading and deduplication' enhances CLI functionality.
PR #5504 by @wtfsayo titled 'fix: auto-build project on 'elizaos start' command' is merged, automating build process.
PR #5582 titled 'chore: provider mapping' is merged, improving provider configuration.
PR #5581 titled 'Fix auto-build test flag usage' is merged, correcting test flag implementation.
Issue #5559 titled 'Cmd + C on `eliazos dev` server doesnt kill server process' by @linear is CLOSED after being open for less than 24 hours.
Issue #5584 titled '[via-discord] Forwarding Messages Between Agents Without Polling â€” Need Help with Agent-to-Agent Communication' by @wtfsayo is OPEN and awaiting responses.
The repository elizaOS/eliza has a list of top contributors, though specific contributor details are not provided in the input data.
